pages.name: about
pages.body:
Joseph is a Native American (Navajo) visual designer and developer committed to creating beautiful, functional tools and new modes for exploring creativity through interactive media. He is currently a Senior Software Engineer at BuzzFeed building infrastructure for the future of media distribution and consumption. His training at Stanford and Harvard as an engineer and Architect have deep roots in media theory and fine arts and his work reflects a blend of the practical, interactive and whimsical. For years, he has been writing and shipping rock solid, professional grade code and working with various development teams, building everything from JavaScript-based media embeds to leading the execution of large-scale consumer iOS applications. He is as comfortable with pen and paper as he is with Xcode and Terminal. He believes that problem solving through quality user experience design is the most important aspect of product development, and this commitment has resulted in beautiful and intuitive experiences that bridge the physical and digital worlds.

posts.name: Gearhead
posts.body:
[gearheadapp.co](http://gearheadapp.co)

Gearhead is the easiest, fastest, and most stunning way to keep track of your car or motorcycle's maintenance, repairs, and fuel economy.

You're proud of your vehicle, so show it off while recording routine upkeep with a sleek modern interface designed for quick scanning and updating. Put away your pen and paper and use Gearhead everytime you fill-up at the gas station and track how your vehicle performs over time. Add your own service items and quickly see what services need to be performed, which ones are coming due, and keep your vehicle in tip-top shape!

Joseph conceived of Gearhead after being frustrated with the existing options for keeping track of maintenance and fuel records for his two vintage motorcycles. Gearhead's powerful record keeping functionality is complemented by a simple and elegant interface which puts all your records right at your fingertips.

posts.name: GoPop
posts.body:
[gopop.co](http://gopop.co)

GoPop is a completely new way to speak in GIFs, photos, videos and drawings. Featured by Apple as a “Best New App,” and Mashable has called GoPop an “app not to miss.” Backed by Lowercase Capital, Advancit Capital, SV Angel, Matter Ventures and the Knight Enterprise Fund.

Released in February 2014, Joseph was Head Product Architect of the iOS app GoPop. Designing the UI/UX as well as the underlying code for the iOS code in both Objective-C and more recently Swift.
